translations: 主持，担任主持；主管某地，掌管（局势）（preside over）；（尤指键盘乐器）领奏，主奏（preside at）

sentences.sentence: The Prime Minister presides at meetings of the Cabinet.
Prime ministers no longer host summits: Herman Van Rompuy presides instead.
sentences.translation: 首相们不再主持峰会：取而代之的是赫尔曼•范龙佩。

sentences.sentence: He now presides over one of the most prodigious wealth-generating machines in history.
sentences.translation: 他目前执掌着有史以来最庞大的赚钱机器之一。
